reviewText: This review is not for Four Star Playhouse as such, which is fine, but for the discs themselves and Amazon's misleading description. The product when purchased (and still was last time I checked) advertised as DVDs. However Alpha seems to have taken to the practice of burning their product onto DVD-R. This may have been acceptable if I had purchased  material from Warner Archive or Sony MOD for example, but in the case of a company which generally uses very poor quality source material and dodgy watermarked transfers it is just one more reason not to buy them. And if I had known, I wouldn't have.
